title: Homework2
text:
pre_bp = c(130, 128, 116, 124, 133, 134, 118, 126, 114, 127, 141, 138, 128, 140, 137, 131, 120, 128, 139, 135)
post_bp = c(114, 98, 113, 99, 107, 116, 113, 111, 119, 117, 101, 119, 130, 122, 106, 106, 124, 102, 117, 113)
patient = paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")
diff_bp = post_bp - pre_bp
diff_mean = mean(diff_bp)

indices = which(diff_bp < 0)
indices

 [1]  1  2  3  4  5  6  7  8 10 11 12 14 15 16 18 19 20

patient[indices]

 [1] "Subject_1"  "Subject_2"  "Subject_3"  "Subject_4"  "Subject_5" 
 [6] "Subject_6"  "Subject_7"  "Subject_8"  "Subject_10" "Subject_11"
[11] "Subject_12" "Subject_14" "Subject_15" "Subject_16" "Subject_18"
[16] "Subject_19" "Subject_20"

pos_diffs = diff_bp[-indices]


The mean difference in blood pressure from pre-treatment to post-treatment was found to be -17
The subset of Subjects that had a higher blood pressure post-treatment were Subject_9, Subject_13, Subject_17
The mean difference in blood pressure post-treatment for those who saw an increase in blood pressure was found to be 3.6666667.

title: Homework2
text:
pre_bp = c(130, 128, 116, 124, 133, 134, 118, 126, 114, 127, 141, 138, 128, 140, 137, 131, 120, 128, 139, 135)
post_bp = c(114, 98, 113, 99, 107, 116, 113, 111, 119, 117, 101, 119, 130, 122, 106, 106, 124, 102, 117, 113)
patient = paste("Subject", 1:20, sep = "_")
diff_bp = post_bp - pre_bp
diff_mean = mean(diff_bp)

indices = which(diff_bp < 0)
indices

 [1]  1  2  3  4  5  6  7  8 10 11 12 14 15 16 18 19 20

patient[indices]

 [1] "Subject_1"  "Subject_2"  "Subject_3"  "Subject_4"  "Subject_5" 
 [6] "Subject_6"  "Subject_7"  "Subject_8"  "Subject_10" "Subject_11"
[11] "Subject_12" "Subject_14" "Subject_15" "Subject_16" "Subject_18"
[16] "Subject_19" "Subject_20"

pos_diffs = diff_bp[-indices]


The mean difference in blood pressure from pre-treatment to post-treatment was found to be -17
The subset of Subjects that had a higher blood pressure post-treatment were Subject_9, Subject_13, Subject_17
The mean difference in blood pressure post-treatment for those who saw an increase in blood pressure was found to be 3.6666667.

title: Homework2
text:
Task 2

title: Homework2
text:
Task 3

pre = c(138, 135, 147, 117, 152, 134, 114, 121, 131, 130)
post = c(105, 136, 123, 130, 134, 143, 135, 139, 120, 124)
patient = paste("Subject", 1:10, sep = "_")
diffs = post - pre

placebo = data.frame(patient,pre,post,diffs)
placebo$low_bp = ifelse(placebo$post < 120, TRUE, FALSE)

new_list = list(treatment = bp_dataframe, placebo = placebo)

new_list[1]
